replies.body: same here...i dont know what to do...trying to change to NA

Hey SticKets! Each Riot account is tied to a specific Region (you choose this Region when you create a League account). If you have an NA account, you no longer need to select NA, simply login with it and you'll be directed to the NA shard.

You can find out more about "Regionless Accounts" here: https://support-leagueoflegends.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/360043328413-Regionless-Accounts-League-of-Legends

you know what, people trashtalk your turboglitchy client a lot and sure it has a long way to go but this is a really nice thing rito, not having to download patches everytime i change region, good job for that one

Hey, sorry you experienced this issue. We're aware of the problem and we're working on a fix. Can you please reach out to Player Support if you haven't already? If possible, please share a screenshot of the issue in this thread.

https://support-leagueoflegends.riotgames.com/hc/en-us
